text: Haya is a monotypic genus of plant in the family Caryophyllaceae. It is endemic to Yemen's Socotra island. The Plant List recognises the single species Haya obovata. Haya obovata grows in subtropical or tropical dry shrubland and rocky areas. ==References== Category:Caryophyllaceae Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Plants described in 1884 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Haya obovata
